meta.dc:subject: legislation
meta.dc:rights: the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

main.docTitle: Air Pollution Control (Specified Processes) (Specification of Required Particulars and Information) Order 1994

section.name: s1
section.heading: Notice of existing premises used for specified processes
section.content: The owner of premises used for the conduct of any of the specified processes listed in Schedule 1 shall give to the Authority a written notice, containing the particulars and information specified in the form set out in Schedule 2, of the existence of the premises.

schedule.name: sch2
schedule.heading: Form
schedule.text:
Air Pollution Control Ordinance(Chapter 311)NOTIFICATION OF THE EXISTENCE OF PREMISES USED FOR THE CONDUCT
OF A SPECIFIED PROCESS PURSUANT TO SECTION 19(1)

tr.td: 1. I/We* the undersigned, being the owner/owners* specified in paragraph 2 of the undermentioned premises, hereby give notice that the premises described in paragraph 3 are used for the conduct of the process specified in paragraph 4 and declare that the particulars and information furnished hereunder are correct.
This notification consists of . pages, with associated drawing (. sheets).

tr.td: schematic diagrams of process flow showing the flow of materials, including raw materials, materials in process of manufacture, manufactured materials, by-products and waste materials; and
a block plan showing the locations of all emission points in the premises with consistent reference numbers.
(2) All emission points and processes/equipment, including air pollution control equipment, associated with each emission point, must be identified and labelled with consistent reference numbers.
